name: Hazardous Salvage
description:
Mine the valuables. Escape into space.

A mutagenic space-plague is sweeping the galaxy. Save the day as our hero, Hazardous Sal, by boarding infected derelicts and ripping the wiring out of the walls. Watch out for mutants!

Made over the 2018-1-8 weekend for #krassjam round 2. The theme was "Mine ore from spaceships with mutants."
